title: Topic 001 Question 072
body: You have an Azure subscription that contains a user named User1 and two resource groups named RG1 and RG2.
You need to ensure that User1 can perform the following tasks:
•	Create virtual machines in RG1 only.
•	Create storage accounts in RG1 only.
What is the minimum number of role-based access control (RBAC) role assignments required?
